description:
Logan is one really friendly guy!

He was smiling from the moment I picked him up at the airport to the moment he left.

Sometimes, when you pick guys up for the first time — especially guys who don't talk much — it can be really awkward with all the silence!

Within ten minutes I felt like I knew everything about him!

Besides being friendly, he is also really cute, with a nice ripped body.

The funniest thing he said was his response to the question: "What do you want to be when you grow up?"

"A plastic surgeon!" he said.

"Why is that?" we asked.

"To make people good looking!" he replied...
title: Logan
